 2004-15922004-12-16,  ,  LAB,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of ALAN D. LEVY of Toronto, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and order that ALAN D. LEVY be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act.
